member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialChart`1
member.summary: Financial charting control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of chart to create

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialChart`1.Options
member.summary: Gets various chart options. The following options are supported: KajiFields, KagiRangeMode, KagiReversalAmount, LineBreakNewLineBreaks, RenkoFields, RenkoRangeMode, RenkoBoxSize.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1
member.summary: Defines a builder to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.High(System.Nullable{System.Double})
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the high value of Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, the high value is caclulated based on data values provided by the itemsSource.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.Low(System.Nullable{System.Double})
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the low value of Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, the low value is caclulated based on data values provided by itemsSource.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.Levels(System.Double[])
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.MaxX(System.Object)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the x maximum value of the Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, current maximum of x-axis is used. The value can be specified as a number or Date object.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.MinX(System.Object)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the x minimal value of the Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, current minimum of x-axis is used. The value can be specified as a number or Date object.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.Uptrend(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets a value indicating whether to create uptrending Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: Default value is true(uptrend). If the value is false, the downtrending levels are plotted.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciBuilder`1.LabelPosition(C1.Web.Mvc.Chart.LabelPosition)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the position of data labels.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciArcsBuilder`1
member.summary: Defines a builder to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciArcsBuilder`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciArcsBuilder`1.Start(C1.Web.Mvc.DataPoint)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the starting DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object. Unlike some of the other Fibonacci tools, the starting DataPoint is not calculated automatically if undefined.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciArcsBuilder`1.End(C1.Web.Mvc.DataPoint)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the ending DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data). Unlike some of the other Fibonacci tools, the ending DataPoint is not calculated automatically if undefined.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciArcsBuilder`1.Levels(System.Double[])
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciArcsBuilder`1.LabelPosition(C1.Web.Mvc.Chart.LabelPosition)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the LabelPosition for levels in FibonacciArcs tool.

member.summary: Defines a builder to configurate .

member.summary: Creates one instance to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciFansBuilder`1.Start(C1.Web.Mvc.DataPoint)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the starting DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciFansBuilder`1.End(C1.Web.Mvc.DataPoint)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the ending DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data).

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciFansBuilder`1.Levels(System.Double[])
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciFansBuilder`1.LabelPosition(C1.Web.Mvc.Chart.LabelPosition)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the LabelPosition for levels in FibonacciArcs tool.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciTimeZonesBuilder`1
member.summary: Defines a builder to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciTimeZonesBuilder`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciTimeZones{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciTimeZonesBuilder`1.StartX(System.Object)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the starting X data point for the time zones.
member.remarks: If not set, the starting X data point is calculated automatically. The value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data).

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciTimeZonesBuilder`1.EndX(System.Object)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the ending X data point for the time zones.
member.remarks: If not set, the ending X data point is calculated automatically. The value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data).

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciTimeZonesBuilder`1.Levels(System.Double[])
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FibonacciTimeZonesBuilder`1.LabelPosition(C1.Web.Mvc.Chart.LabelPosition)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the LabelPosition for levels in FibonacciTimeZones tool.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder
member.summary: Defines a builder to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions)
member.summary: Creates one instance to configurate .

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.KagiFields(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the DataFields used for the Kagi chart.
member.remarks: The default value is DataFields.Close.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.KagiRangeMode(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RangeMode)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the RangeMode for the Kagi chart.
member.remarks: The default value is RangeMode.Fixed.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.KagiReversalAmount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the reversal amount for the Kagi chart.
member.remarks: The default value is 14.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.LineBreakNewLineBreaks(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the number of previous boxes that must be compared before a new box is drawn in Line Break charts.
member.remarks: The default value is 3.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.RenkoFields(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the DataFields used for the Renko chart.
member.remarks: The default value is DataFields.Close.Note:Renko doesn't support HighLow.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.RenkoRangeMode(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RangeMode)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the RangeMode for the Renko chart.
member.remarks: The default value is RangeMode.Fixed.Note:Renko doesn't support Percentage.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.RenkoBoxSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the box size for the Renko chart.
member.remarks: The default value is 14.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.PointAndFigureBoxSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the box size for the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is 1.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.PointAndFigureReversal(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the reversal amount for the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is 3.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.PointAndFigurePeriod(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the ATR period of the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is 20. Must be an integer less than the length of the data and greater than one.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.PointAndFigureFields(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the DataFields used for the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is Close. Only the Close and HighLow are supported.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fluent.FinancialExtraOptionsBuilder.PointAndFigureScaling(C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.PointAndFigureScaling)
member.summary: Configurates . Specifies the scaling mode for point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is Traditional.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ATR`1
member.summary: Base class for overlay and indicator series that render a single series
member.remarks: Average true range is used to measure the volatility of an asset. Average true range does not provide any indication of the price's trend, but rather the degree of price volatility.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ATR`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.FlexChartCore{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.CCI`1
member.summary: Represents a Commodity Channel Index indicator series for the FinancialChart.
member.remarks: The commodity channel index is an oscillator that measures an asset's current price level relative to an average price level over a specified period of time.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.CCI`1.Constant
member.summary: Gets or sets the constant value for the CCI calculation.

member.summary: Represents a Moving Average Envelopes overlay series for the FinancialChart

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Envelopes`1.Period
member.summary: Gets or sets the period for the calculation as an integer value.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Envelopes`1.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the moving average type for the envelopes.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Envelopes`1.Size
member.summary: Gets or set the size of the moving average envelopes.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1
member.summary: Represents a Fibonacci tool for FinancialChart. The tool enables the calculation and plotting of various alert levels that are useful in financial charts.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.High
member.summary: Gets or sets the high value of Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, the high value is caclulated based on data values provided by the itemsSource.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.Low
member.summary: Gets or sets the low value of Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, the low value is caclulated based on data values provided by itemsSource.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.Levels
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.MaxX
member.summary: Gets or sets the x maximum value of the Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, current maximum of x-axis is used. The value can be specified as a number or Date object.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.MinX
member.summary: Gets or sets the x minimal value of the Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: If not specified, current minimum of x-axis is used. The value can be specified as a number or Date object.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.Uptrend
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create uptrending Fibonacci tool.
member.remarks: Default value is true(uptrend). If the value is false, the downtrending levels are plotted.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.LabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of data labels.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.FlexChartCore{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Fibonacci`1.ExtraSeriesTypeName
member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs`1
member.summary: Represents a Fibonacci Arcs tool for the FinancialChart.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs`1.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object. Unlike some of the other Fibonacci tools, the starting DataPoint is not calculated automatically if undefined.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs`1.End
member.summary: Gets or sets the ending DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data). Unlike some of the other Fibonacci tools, the ending DataPoint is not calculated automatically if undefined.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs`1.Levels
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs`1.LabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the LabelPosition for levels in FibonacciArcs tool.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.FlexChartCore{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciArcs`1.ExtraSeriesTypeName
member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciFans`1
member.summary: Represents a Fibonacci Fans tool for the FinancialChart.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciFans`1.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciFans`1.End
member.summary: Gets or sets the ending DataPoint for the base line.
member.remarks: The DataPoint X value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data).

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciFans`1.Levels
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciFans`1.LabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the LabelPosition for levels in FibonacciArcs tool.

member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciTimeZones`1
member.summary: Represents a Fibonacci Time Zones tool for the FinancialChart.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciTimeZones`1.StartX
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting X data point for the time zones.
member.remarks: If not set, the starting X data point is calculated automatically. The value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data).

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciTimeZones`1.EndX
member.summary: Gets or sets the ending X data point for the time zones.
member.remarks: If not set, the ending X data point is calculated automatically. The value can be a number or a Date object (for time-based data).

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciTimeZones`1.Levels
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of levels for plotting.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FibonacciTimeZones`1.LabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the LabelPosition for levels in FibonacciTimeZones tool.

member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions
member.summary: Extra options for financial chart.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.KagiFields
member.summary: Specifies the DataFields used for the Kagi chart.
member.remarks: The default value is DataFields.Close.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.KagiRangeMode
member.summary: Specifies the RangeMode for the Kagi chart.
member.remarks: The default value is RangeMode.Fixed.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.KagiReversalAmount
member.summary: Specifies the reversal amount for the Kagi chart.
member.remarks: The default value is 14.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.LineBreakNewLineBreaks
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of previous boxes that must be compared before a new box is drawn in Line Break charts.
member.remarks: The default value is 3.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.RenkoFields
member.summary: Specifies the DataFields used for the Renko chart.
member.remarks: The default value is DataFields.Close.Note:Renko doesn't support HighLow.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.RenkoRangeMode
member.summary: Specifies the RangeMode for the Renko chart.
member.remarks: The default value is RangeMode.Fixed.Note:Renko doesn't support Percentage.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.RenkoBoxSize
member.summary: Specifies the box size for the Renko chart.
member.remarks: The default value is 14.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.PointAndFigureBoxSize
member.summary: Specifies the box size for the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is 1.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.PointAndFigureReversal
member.summary: Specifies the reversal amount for the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is 3.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.PointAndFigurePeriod
member.summary: Specifies the ATR period of the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is 20. Must be an integer less than the length of the data and greater than one.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.PointAndFigureFields
member.summary: Specifies the DataFields used for the point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is Close. Only the Close and HighLow are supported.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialExtraOptions.PointAndFigureScaling
member.summary: Specifies the scaling mode for point and figure chart.
member.remarks: The default is Traditional.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialSeries`1
member.summary: Represents a series of data points to display in the chart.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinancialSeries`1.ChartType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of financial chart to create.

member.summary: Creates one instance.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Macd`1
member.summary: Represents a Moving Average Convergence/Divergence (MACD) indicator series for the FinancialChart.
member.remarks: The MACD indicator is designed to reveal changes in strength, direction, momentum, and duration of an asset's price trend.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Macd`1.Styles
member.summary: Gets or sets the styles for the MACD and Signal lines.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Macd`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.FlexChartCore{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Macd`1.ExtraSeriesTypeName
member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MacdBase`1
member.summary: Base class for Macd and MacdHistogram series (abstract).

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MacdBase`1.FastPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the fast exponential moving average period for the MACD line.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MacdBase`1.SlowPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the slow exponential moving average period for the MACD line.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MacdBase`1.SmoothingPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the exponential moving average period for the signal line.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MacdHistogram`1
member.summary: Represents a Moving Average Convergence/Divergence (MACD) Histogram indicator series for the FinancialChart.
member.remarks: The MACD indicator is designed to reveal changes in strength, direction, momentum, and duration of an asset's price trend.

member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MacdHistogram`1.ExtraSeriesTypeName
member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RSI`1
member.summary: Represents a Relative Strength Index indicator series for the FinancialChart.
member.remarks: Relative strength index is a momentum osciallator designed to measure the current and historical strength or weakness of an asset based on the closing prices of a recent trading period.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RSI`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.FlexChartCore{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.SingleOverlayIndicatorBase`1
member.summary: Base class for overlay and indicator series that render a single series.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.SingleOverlayIndicatorBase`1.Period
member.summary: Gets or sets the period for the calculation as an integer value.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Stochastic`1
member.summary: Represents a Stochastic Oscillator indicator series for the FinancialChart.
member.remarks: Stochastic oscillators are momentum indicators designed to predict price turning points by comparing an asset's closing price to its high-low range.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Stochastic`1.KPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the period for the %K calculation.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Stochastic`1.DPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the period for the %D simple moving average.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Stochastic`1.SmoothingPeriod
member.summary: Gets or sets the smoothing period for full %K.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Stochastic`1.Styles
member.summary: Gets or sets the styles for the %K and %D lines.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Stochastic`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.FlexChartCore{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.Stochastic`1.ExtraSeriesTypeName
member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.WilliamsR`1
member.summary: Represents a Willaims %R indicator series for the FinancialChart.
member.remarks: Represents a Willaims %R indicator series for the FinancialChart.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.WilliamsR`1.#ctor(C1.Web.Mvc.FlexChartCore{`0})
member.summary: Creates one instance.
member.param: The owner should be derived from FlexChartCore

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.WilliamsR`1.ExtraSeriesTypeName
member.summary: Gets the Name of this Series.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MovingAverageType
member.summary: Represents the moving average type for the envelopes.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MovingAverageType.Simple
member.summary: The simple moving average is simply the average of the last n values.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.MovingAverageType.Exponential
member.summary: The exponential moving average is a weighted average of the last n values, where the weighting decreases exponentially with each previous value.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType
member.summary: Specifies the type of financial chart.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.Column
member.summary: Shows vertical bars and allows you to compare values of items across categories.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.Scatter
member.summary: Uses X and Y coordinates to show patterns within the data.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.Line
member.summary: Shows trends over a period of time or across categories.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.LineSymbols
member.summary: Shows line chart with a symbol on each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.Area
member.summary: Shows line chart with area below the line filled with color.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.Candlestick
member.summary: Presents items with high, low, open, and close values. The size of the wick line is determined by the High and Low values, while the size of the bar is determined by the Open and Close values. The bar is displayed using different colors, depending on whether the close value is higher or lower than the open value.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.HighLowOpenClose
member.summary: Displays the same information as a candlestick chart, except that opening values are displayed using lines to the left, while lines to the right indicate closing values.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.HeikinAshi
member.summary: Derived from the candlestick chart and uses information from the current and prior period in order to filter out the noise. These charts cannot be combined with any other series objects.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.LineBreak
member.summary: Filters out noise by focusing exclusively on price changes. These charts cannot be combined with any other series objects.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.Renko
member.summary: Ignores time and focuses on price changes that meet a specified amount. These charts cannot be combined with any other series objects.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.Kagi
member.summary: Ignores time and focuses on price action. These charts cannot be combined with any other series objects.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.ColumnVolume
member.summary: Identical to the standard Column chart, except that the width of each bar is determined by the Volume value.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.EquiVolume
member.summary: Similar to the Candlestick chart, but shows the high and low values only. In addition, the width of each bar is determined by Volume value.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.CandleVolume
member.summary: Identical to the standard Candlestick chart, except that the width of each bar is determined by Volume value.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.ArmsCandleVolume
member.summary: Created by Richard Arms, this chart is a combination of EquiVolume and CandleVolume chart types.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.ChartType.PointAndFigure
member.summary: Point and figure financial chart.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields
member.summary: Specifies which fields are to be used for calculation. Applies to Renko and Kagi chart types.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.Close
member.summary: Close values are used for calculations.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.High
member.summary: High values are used for calculations.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.Low
member.summary: Low values are used for calculations.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.Open
member.summary: Open values are used for calculations.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.HighLow
member.summary: High-Low method is used for calculations. DataFields.HighLow is currently not supported with Renko chart types.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.HL2
member.summary: Average of high and low values is used for calculations.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.HLC3
member.summary: Average of high, low, and close values is used for calculations.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataFields.HLOC4
member.summary: Average of high, low, open, and close values is used for calculations.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RangeMode
member.summary: Specifies the unit for Kagi and Renko chart types.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RangeMode.Fixed
member.summary: Uses a fixed, positive number for the Kagi chart's reversal amount or Renko chart's box size.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RangeMode.ATR
member.summary: Uses the current Average True Range value for Kagi chart's reversal amount or Renko chart's box size. When ATR is used, the reversal amount or box size option of these charts must be an integer and will be used as the period for the ATR calculation.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.RangeMode.Percentage
member.summary: Uses a percentage for the Kagi chart's reversal amount. RangeMode.Percentage is currently not supported with Renko chart types.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.PointAndFigureScaling
member.summary: Specifies the scaling mode for point and figure chart.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.PointAndFigureScaling.Traditional
member.summary: Traditional scaling. The box size is calculated automatically based on price range.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.PointAndFigureScaling.Fixed
member.summary: Fixed scaling. The box size is defined by boxSize property.

member.name: F:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.PointAndFigureScaling.Dynamic
member.summary: Dynamic(ATR) scaling. The box size is calculated based on ATR.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.FinanceWebResourcesManager.#ctor(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FinanceWebResourcesManager class.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.C1FinancialChart
member.summary: Defines C1 FinancialChart related js and css.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.DataPointConvert
member.summary: This converter only works the properties Start and End in the FibonacciArcs class, Start and End in the FibonacciFans class. Because in client side it only accepts the type of wijmo.chart.DataPoint.

member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.LicenseDetector
member.summary: Define a class for detecting C1.Web.Mvc.Finance license.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Finance.LicenseDetector.#ctor
member.summary: The constructor.
